document_notes.text:
This update for pcre2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-1587: Fixed out-of-bounds read due to bug in recursions (bsc#1199235).

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4

notes.text: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in the PCRE2 library in the get_recurse_data_length() function of the pcre2_jit_compile.c file. This issue affects recursions in JIT-compiled regular expressions caused by duplicate data transfers.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
